sentences.english: The wall behind looks a bit grey and dull.

sentences.english: Some windows are lighted. But mostly they're darked.

sentences.english: The gulls went in slanting flight up the wind toward the gray desolate east.

sentences.english: Your eyes are lifeless, your face is ashen, hair loss.

sentences.english: My eyes flash open in the predawn gray .

sentences.english: On grey mornings of rain I have crooned many an idle song.

sentences.english: It was just in the season of the late autumn, so there shows a gloomy and desolate scene even more.

sentences.english: It means something like a kind of dulled grayness or ordinariness of life.

sentences.english: We spent an hour and a half in a dingy consulting room, where the doctor performed a series of tests on Yvette.

sentences.english: A bit like winter sadly, this morning is dark grey and minging – like an elephant’s ringpiece.
